oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Banner Banquet of Champions, Nashville, Tennessee, 1956 January 31
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: James G. Stahlman, Publisher of the Nashville Banner at the 1956 Banner Banquet of Champions, seated with an unidentified man next to the podium. The Nashville Banner hosted this annual event held in Nashville, Tennessee, to honor sports achievement. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stahlman, James Geddes, 1893-
Nashville Banner
